sentences.sContent: "All of us together, in that beautiful place, " one attendee recalls.
sentences.sContent_eng: "All of us together, in that beautiful place, " one attendee recalls.
sentences.sCn: “我们聚在在那个美丽的地方，”一位出席聚会的员工回忆。

remMethod.val: 来自attend(v. 参加， 出席)

words.tran: 出席者；按规定常到的人；常客
出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

trans.tranOther: someone who is at an event such as a meeting or a course
